Email address of friend (insert comma between multiple addresses): Your email address: Copy Me Add a brief note: Send Email Processing... Zagat: Chick-fil-A the top large fast-food chain
Atlanta Business Chronicle Date: Tuesday, September 6, 2011, 10:19am EDT Related: Retailing&Restaurants Enlarge Image PR Newswire Chick-fil-A Inc. is Zagat's No. 1 rated large chain in terms of food, facilities and service ratings.
Chick-fil-A Inc. Chick-fil-A Inc. Latest from The Business Journals Chick-fil-A opening free-standing restaurant in South San Antonio Miramonte Career Solutions sold to IMPACT Chick-fil-A among anti-gay companies? Follow this company has lots to cluck about in the new Zagat Fast Food Survey.
The Atlanta-based chain is the No. 1 rated large chain in terms of food, facilities and service ratings.
Chick-fil-A also is the fourth most-popular large fast food chain in America, beat in popularity only by Five Guys Five Guys Latest from The Business Journals The Top 5 fastest-growing restaurants in the US Top 5 fastest-growing U.S. restaurants Smashburger opens first Alabama location, eyes Birmingham market Follow this company , Panera Bread and Chipotle.
The survey also said Chick-fil-A has the best grilled chicken, fourth-best milkshakes, second-best drive-thru service, fifth-best fries, third-best breakfast sandwiches.
Zagat’s annual National Fast Food Restaurant Survey covered 103 chains voted on by 6,064 diners. The typical surveyor dined at a fast food restaurant at least once a week.
Click here for more on the survey .
